nodes.text: Green Two was the call sign of the second member of Green Squadron. There were a number of starfighter squadrons with this name, and several pilots went by the call sign Green Two.
During the Clone Wars, Green Two was the call sign of a clone trooper pilot, who piloted a V-19 Torrent starfighter during the Battle of Rendili.
Shortly before the Battle of Yavin a Rebel Alliance pilot known as Green Two stationed at Anchorhead Base flew a T-16 skyhopper while "Rookie One" underwent a training trial through Beggar's Canyon.
Years later, Green Two was the call sign used by a rebel X-wing fighter pilot who escorted the freighter Otana past Imperial Star Destroyers during the evacuation of Hoth.

After the Battle of Hoth, Ace Azzameen flew an X-wing starfighter as Green Two for his Starfighter Superiority Evaluation, and returned to the call sign in a B-wing starfighter for combat missions such as the Battle of Bettel, the destruction of the Obsidian, and the Battle of Hurrim Base.
The following year, Gemmer Sojan flew as Green Two in the Battle of Endor.

Two and a half years after the Battle of Endor, New Republic Gand pilot Ooryl Qrygg used the call sign Green Two in a simulation of the Redemption scenario while training to qualify for membership in the reformed Rogue Squadron.
